name: Batman Loves Him a Parallelogram ~or~ I Considered an Oeuvre
name_original: Batman Loves Him a Parallelogram ~or~ I Considered an Oeuvre
description:
Batman is looking for a secret weapon to use on his birthday. He gets involved with gangs and discovers that this is exactly what he wants. A parallelogram. The Penguin makes things worse by falling in love with Batman.

Periodically they look at art together.

In this competitive multiplayer game, Batman must scoot the parallelogram into The Penguin's goal area for points! But watch out, The Penguin can do the same. In addition, if the Penguin bumps up against Batman, he'll get some points, too. So, watch those sparks fly! The game features three periods of parallelogram scootin' / batman kissin' action!

Also there are breaks featuring important pieces of art.

(Made for the Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam 4)
